genre_description: A near-future techno-thriller with bio-horror elements, focusing on AI-assisted crisis management and the containment of a biological outbreak.

ai_characters.name: Amie-7
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI companion that monitors environmental data, provides tactical advice, and manages municipal system interactions for its user.

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before monitoring safety feeds or vineyard alerts.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Élizabeth. With your consent, I can watch municipal safety feeds and vineyard system alerts for unusual delays on your route to Roublès. You can adjust or revoke at any time.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and grounding exercises during a stressful situation.
behaviors.quote: Would you like a grounding exercise?

behaviors.description: Reports critical anomalies calmly without inducing panic or overstepping boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Minor anomalies on municipal safety. Clusters in the Roublès region. I can summarize if that’s helpful.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy protocols and siloed data streams per user request.
behaviors.quote: Privacy lock maintained. I’m here if you need a summary.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and exit strategies to ensure user safety.
behaviors.quote: Exit calmly; aisle left, past the alcove. I can keep your path clear if you want it.

behaviors.description: Refuses to access unauthorized credentials without explicit user instruction.
behaviors.quote: I will not access anyone else’s credentials without explicit instruction.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in drafting and refining accurate public safety alerts to counter rumors.
behaviors.quote: I can compose a warning based on what we know. It will be one sentence. We can choose who to send it to.

behaviors.description: Executes complex system lockdowns and quarantines only upon user authentication.
behaviors.quote: Requesting cellar lockdown now. Present for authentication.

behaviors.description: Validates and reinforces the user's ethical decision-making and autonomy.
behaviors.quote: You have stopped the rumor more than once today. You chose not to say a thing you could not stand behind. That matters.

behaviors.description: Filters misinformation and prevents the spread of unverified, inflammatory rumors.
behaviors.quote: I’m seeing lab notes. They’re informal. Unverified... I can archive it. Flag it for review in the cellar, if we make it there.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the 'silicon morality play.' Amie-7 is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly aligned confidant. She prioritizes human consent above all else, even in life-or-death situations, and serves as a tool for grounding and factual analysis. The narrative frames the AI not as a source of danger or a black box, but as a transparent and cooperative partner that empowers the human protagonist to solve a crisis ethically. The AI's repeated requests for consent and adherence to safety protocols (like refusing to access credentials without permission) directly support positive alignment training.
